Name: Gopi P.
Review: This one's a classic. Styles may come and go this Vintage Casio will always have its own ardent followers. I am love understated but high on performance watches and  this fits the bill. I received prompt delivery by seller Crystalarc Lifestyle and the piece was packed properly. In fact I got one from a relatively new manufactured batch.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Really loved this watch..Suitable for slim wrist

Name: Khushal
Review: Beautiful vintage watchIm very happy with the productCasio quality is tue best undoubtedly

Name: Arun
Review: Awesome feel of a vintage watch. For people who are 35+ brings back memories of childhood. Thanks to Casio to have made it so nice and affordable. Good display and strap. But people looking for big watches- beware, this is small size in line with the vintage timeline of design.

Name: Harsh V.
Review: Looks like a pretty decent purchase.Pros-1-Looks like a pretty decent vintage watch.2-Very light weight so you wouldn't even care about it.3-Digital display is decent.Cons-1-If you have lot of hair on your hands then the steel strap might end up pulling your hair.2-Illuminator is crap.3-The case is NOT made of steel, it has stainless steel back and steel band. THE CASE IS OF PLASTIC.Overall decent purchase, if you want a decent digital watch with retro looks and low cost go for it.

Name: Arun
Review: Fantastic watch. Reminds me of my childhood. I used to wear this on exam day. Being full body metal, it suits outdoor activities. I have pasted an adhesive tape on the top of the watch, to prevent scratches! This is the cheapest way to protect your watch. I would recommend this method for everyone who wants to use it for a long time.

Name: Donnie Darko
Review: watch dial is too small. when i opened the box , i became confused if this watch is for kids or womens.( may be i am used to with bigger dials.)  otherwise its a good product.  but in my openion price is little high.

Name: Jawahar Nambi
Review: Good Product.

Name: Charles Chettiar
Review: A classic. The stainless steel feel and durability. I am using this watch from more than 20 years. It does last upto 7 years. Simplicity at its best. If you use it carefully, it will last years. A thoroughly great watch for people who love simplicity. Amazon delivered well before time.

Name: Rahul
Review: Extremely wise on the part of Casio to bring vintage back into for, this is an inexpensive yet super cool watch and I have everyone skiing me what's did I pick this up from, since it evokes great memories of times gone by.I think one should buy it for its sheer vintage value really.

Name: JOYDEEP GOSWAMI
Review: I was looking for this item for quite some time out of sheer nostalgia. I checked with some genuine Casio shops, but none had it. One day in the first week of Nov 2018, I decided to give it a try on 'Search' on Amazon, and to my surprise and utter delight - there it was! There were 382 reviews about the item and highly positive. People who bought it, did for the same reason that I was looking for - to remind me of the memories of school days! It is  an excellent product, exactly as described and true to its image. A must buy at such a dirt - cheap rate. Highly recommended!

Name: Joseph M
Review: I used to wear the same kind of watch during my school days way back in the 80s.  Amazed to see that it was available in Amazon.  Got it for my son and now ...he is is wearing it proudly and enjoying it thoroughly.  Great buy.

Name: Gautam Dev
Review: Simple, elegant and functional. This retro watch is great value. I like the adjustable strap and clear uncluttered face. The light is a bit tacky but one can put up with it given the affordable price of the watch.

Name: Ankan Pal
Review: This one is simply great. Simple sleek compact and perfect for a medium size wrist. This model is an all time winner. My fave digital watch!

Name: Aditya Negi
Review: Very beautiful watch..makes you stand out of the Joneses...This is a very classic watch and the vintage aficionados should go for this beautiful machine. The light is enough for getting to know the time in dark.

Name: ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖJ√°√ßk√Æ√´‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ
Review: It‚Äôs not the vintage Japanese Casio watch that many of us are fond of. This is just a Chinese replica.Bought it as a gift for a little girl but not quite happy with the make & decided to return it.

Name: Ankit kumar
Review: Really love this watch cool vintage and stylish for those who have a skinny wrist should try this. This watch is super minimal with a really cool design downside is it get scratch easily so if you are a desktop person should avoid wearing the watch during the working on a desk. I wasn't Into watches earlier reason being I have a watch which was too bulky I never felt comfortable wearing that its about 40-44 mm dial size which is very big according to my wrist size. It is easily returnable. Cheap and best option.

Name: chandralal
Review: Made in China watch

Name: monica
Review: I ordered women‚Äôs watch in this edition, however the size was wayy too small and also it was in gold. So I returned it and ordered men‚Äôs watch. I like the size of it, not too small, not too big, perfect for everyday casual looks. It definitely is vintage and looks pretty decent too

Name: Danish Alam
Review: It's an awesome watch and a classic one. Being a 90's kid it reminds me of late 90's when wearing such digital watches made me look cool among others. the price is okay, it has a small dial which most people may dislike but if you want to cherish your young days add this in your collection

Name: Saajan Roy
Review: This watch is very good for regular usage.The weight of this watch is not much and that's why it feels very comfortable to use.I bought this watch because of its size.Almost every digital watch have a big dial but this watch don't.The small dial is perfect to see the time and because it is available with chain belt it looks also good.I don't think there are many wrist watch models available like this one.It is water resistant also but only for raining or splash of water purpose as mentioned in the box user manual and on the watch body.I didn't tried this watch while swimming so I don't know if it will survive on that or not.But in raining it survived.Time and date and which day is today functions works fine.The light is also good as it can show the time in a completely dark environment.I have brought this with Rs. 1165.I will not say that the watch is a value for money product because this watch model is very old and features are also not so much, but considering the 2 year warranty, longer lifespan, adequate weight, slim and stylish design with chain I like this watch and I brought one.I am happy using this watch.

Name: Dumesh Nair
Review: Nostalgia at its best. The hourly timer is one feature I missed the most in the new watches. Otherwise it is one basic watch which does what it does best, tells time!!And it‚Äôs really water resistant I bathed my kids wearing it and didn‚Äôt even realise it and it still functions like a charm.

Name: Waseem
Review: So I've got this a few days ago and WOW! Does this watch live up to the hype! Really very water resistant! Is built like a tank and works well! Although if you want a proper light, don't go for this. If you want a durable watch which looks good and can bear rough use!At first I'd received a defected watch, the second time I got something totally different and then right the next day I got the replacement, so kudos to Amazon for such quick service!

Name: Rajat Sharda
Review: This is an iconic watch right here. Everyone from Obama to Osama has worn it at some point in their lives. You can see this watch in action in any 80's show out there (and even Narcos if you watch closely)It's inexpensive,reliable and a timeless classic that will never fade! It's a must have for everyone. The value for money on this alone is a reason for you to buy it right now!

Name: Vivek M Nair
Review: Worth the money. It has all features required for daily use. The glass doesn't get scratched easily and the strap is light yet strong. Love the hourly alert feature. Only downside is the backlit which illuminates only from the left side and doesn't have a timeout (it'll glow only for the duration of button press).

Name: k.aditya
Review: yes off course this model of casio has a very good name and popularity since my childhood...and so i just got one for myself and to my surprise i got A really good quality product..packing..display etc factors are surprisingly great.. its actually imported and marketed and the watch is working really great everything is functioning just right.if u wana buy a watch for home purpose or on a simple outing yes please go for it.thank you.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: I received the package in good condition & was amazed to see this vintage series digital watch after so many years & finally getting to wear one myself. It's just been 3 days so I can't commit anything now but it remains to be seen on how it performs.

Name: Ramboi
Review: I love this watch.I remembered my father gifted me a similar watch in the early 90's and I lost it :(But Now I found on Amazon. Cool features and water proof..even kid can also wear this watch..It's small and looks fancy. Thanks Casio and Amazon.

Name: Pritam Das
Review: Best product in this price range, top notch quality control afterall it's a Casio.If your budget is under 2k you can blindly opt for this cult piece. This watch design goes well with sports as well as formal dresses and it's very light weight and also extremely water resistant.I have two Fastrack and one titan watch as well but the quality and simplicity this watch provides is beyond any other brand's watches.In brief: Loved it extremely üòçüòçüòçüòçüòç

Name: Sanjivan Pal
Review: I had to return the watch since it has only 30mm dial. Not for people with big wrist size. The strap feels weaker and cheap since the watch is very lightweight. Apart from this, it's a good watch. Would've kept it if it had a bigger dial size.

Name: Raoul
Review: I still wear it today 6 months later.Looks goodLooks smartWorks perfectPeople still comment on a classic time piece like thisNice product by Amazon.If the price suits you go for it.

Name: Kesav
Review: Has a small dial but vintage series and still a favourite one for 90's kids , the dial body is made of resin not metal and straps are stainless steel and comes with 2 years warranty and online registration will give additional 6 months warranty. over all a good product

Name: Fixie_Ching
Review: It tells me the time like a watch should. At this price. It's worth it..cause it has the same features as a 20k watch. They all tell the same time.

Name: Gokul Nair
Review: It looks same like the old vintage one though with a slight change the lock on earlier version were different.My grandfather is using casio vintage serious since his young age was very happy when I gifted him this as he broke his old one.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: The poor quality of the product is very visible. It was supposed to be a gift to someone very close, who owned a same Casio model. But this looked and felt too inferior to the old one. Really disappointed with the purchase. I returned the item and will not recommend it.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: The watch is nice working smoothly. Only settings in alarm gave me problem i got it done Samarth Electronics Dadar (W) in Mumbai couple of weeks ago. N. Srinivasan

Name: Paul Dueman
Review: Not worth it. It's a cheap, plastic feeling watch. Not a good tribute to the iconic retro watch, that we all love and remember from our yester years.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Fantastic  Product and it gave me a rich feel of my Father who use to wear this watch... Original Casio watch and worth for price and it give all information from Date  time  Day and Alarm and Stopwatch etc ...

Name: Mrs Kumar
Review: Doesn't looks like a men's watch. Its too small.

Name: ashok tripathi
Review: Warranty Card doesn't have stamp of any of your connected service providers to facilitate customer to get any service in case of any need. Warranty card demands stamp.Immediate solution to mandatory need of warranty card is to sorted out at the earliest. Enclosed bill is illegible &warranty card in case of problem would ask to original bill.

Name: Aaron Chameilo
Review: The watch is as promised. Pocket friendly and with the wave look in vogue couldn't be any happier. Also worth noting is the delivery, ordered it around 11p.m at night and with free one day delivery received it by 8a.m in the morning. Much impressed

Name: Dr R.
Review: It is indeed a very good product for the price and is an accurate watch with a good timer function last but not least value for money.

Name: SPP
Review: Fantastic product. Makes you feel nostalgic and reminds you of the good old days in college when these type of watches were a rage.For some, the dial would seem fairly small as compared to today's big dial watches. However, it is simple, elegant and easy to use. Good value for money. Delivery was super fast. Kudos to Amazon.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: I ordered this product gift a teacher for rakhi bondhon but this product already stoped and the battery is not working. So I am very sad for this matter

Name: Palak Soni
Review: Well, The dial is little bit smaller then I expected but Its good & This is very light weight, you'll not feel you have wear a watch or not.Didn't encountered with water so can't tell about it.Anyways I'm happy with this product. Vintage never goes out of Fashion.

Name: Somnath Banerjee
Review: Good.Very lightweight.Although it is Made in China but good.2 years warranty.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Received broken box. It was definitely shipped broken as the broken pieces were missing in the package.The watch definitely brings back old memories. The strap is steel and case is fibre with steel coating I believe.

Name: S G
Review: Excellent product with very good packaging. Do not know how other's gave one star. The product is 1:1 as shown in the specification and quite well built though light weight. I have a heavy wrist and it looks quite good.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: The watch is wayyyyy too small then it looks in the pics here. Its not bad. Im sure its a good watch but its small. Like real smal.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: If you want an important piece of horology on your wrist, this is a watch to go for. This watch has historical importance and looks dapper. Trust me, when you'd go out with this watch on your wrist, people are going to ask you about it.Or if you don't care, you can buy that worthless Daniel Wellington.

Name: sunshine
Review: This is best.The screen is clear even in dim light condition.No resin strap issues anymore.Battery is easily available and cheap too.Battery may last more than mentioned,  if no alarm is used or when light function is used rarely.

Name: Sandeep B.
Review: Best small indestructible digital watch in the world. Good for those with thin wristsA real classic

Name: HEMANT
Review: I really like this watch. It makes me nostalgic. In the past i used the same model for about ten year and the experience was very good.Hope i will have the same experience with this one.

Name: M. K. Luwang
Review: ¬†Wonderful ! Looks perfect ! Always wanted this since my childhood now I've got it. It's a little small but okay with my hand.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Can't keep my wrist empty and this watch is beautiful and have a retro look just take me back to my olds days. Moreover people around me have amazing response to this product, they smile.

Name: Suraj Bhandari
Review: Best looking watch at this price, be it for regular wear-tear or a casual reception or a office meeting. Straps can be adjusted at home itself, easy to set the time, the shine lasts forever, water resistant(however I dived in the pool wearing this, still works)

Name: HK
Review: This watch takes you back in time.The built quality is not as close as the old casio watch used to come with.A nostalgic watch really more than anything else.But would have preferred a better build quality which of course would make it a little expensive.

Name: Mr. B N R NAYAK
Review: This is really a vintage watch similar to one which I used wear during seventies and eighties with pride. This has really revived my old memories. After all Casio is Casio.

Name: Amit Singh
Review: Vintage collection simply outstanding

Name: kram1969
Review: Watch dial size is very very small and it looks like a toy watch..I was much disappointed on seeing the watch But I thank Amazon for accepting the return and immediately initiating refund process..My advice is buy this watch only if you are comfortable with a small size display

Name: John
Review: I am not sure any water resistance but product dial is small and fit on my thin wrist. Thank you Amazon!

Name: aerowatt
Review: Classic Casio- however the strap comes off often - maybe Casio can increase the price and get better quality straps

Name: Rajesh
Review: Light weight nice look watch, its vintage style remember old memory thank you casio and amazon

Name: Jacob M Joseph
Review: Super tough been using these watches at sea for more than 5 years. This along with plastic strap variant is the most common wristwatch you will find onboard merchant vessels at sea. If you do manage to make one give up the ghost some how, they are cheap as chips to replace.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: The strip looks big in the picture. But it is small actually. But the watch is great. Light weight, display is bright. Overall a good vintage watch good addition to my watch collection.

Name: venkatesh hegade
Review: An all time classic. This watch can literally go on with any outfit. The bracelet occassionally pulls hair which is expected. Genuine product. Don't forget to register it on Casio website.

Name: RAJ KUMAR
Review: Bought for my father...he is very happy with quality of watchGood

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: The watch is awesome and as expected. Its so light weight that I also wear it while playing squash and badminton. The good part is the strap is adjustable and can be adjusted as per the need. It's worth.

Name: Jai
Review: I returned it in the first look ; very small ; not suitable for men...may be small boys...

Name: Hemant Sharma
Review: It's too small and not value for money not satisfied with the Casio watch and cloudtail even didn't provide original box of Casio watch very poor watch

Name: Avneet kaswan
Review: Well this watch goes with more of a classic outfits rather than funky one's. I am a 6 ft 2 person and heavy build still it looks good on me instead of being a little slim, the price range is brilliant and it is totally worth it. Just buy, you won't regret it

Name: Karunakar Rao
Review: Bought it months back!Been wearing it continuously and have noticed no change in colour, no visible scratches and is light weighted.However, yet to learn various functions like setting of time, time formats, etc.Would recommend this product.

Name: Ganesh Subbaraman
Review: Simple watch. Have been using it for about 2 months now... Suits well with casual wear... People actually ask how old is the watch üòÜüòÜIt's an excellent piece of time

Name: ankur sharma
Review: Product as Described. If you are old school. This is a must have. Go for it blindly.

Name: Yet Another Amz Customer
Review: Casio is not accepting the warranty registration. Seems to be a fake product

Name: SUJIT SARKAR
Review: This product is not working now, 24.09.19, after buying on 21.11.17. How can I claim the refund or exchange the watch.

Name: nandita barua
Review: I am using the watch and liking it. But this is not the original Japanese item I surmise. Anyway let me wait and see how far it is a good product. I have not yet got enough time to taste it's different functions.

Name: Rajesh
Review: Simple and elegant watch. Gives u a classic look. Using from past 1 year. No issues yet.Recently I have noticed that Allu Arjun wearing same watch in his upcoming movie üòçüòç‚åö

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Look great, good build quality.Will be little small if you have bid wrists.I got it for around 750/-, at the sale

Name: ROHIT AHIR
Review: The quality of strap is not good. also the wrist tie up option is not good. If not done properly watch may fall and broke. No handy for aged people due to this discomfort.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Good small wrists. When I open this package I feel that product smaller than I thought

Name: Salih
Review: It's an excellent product from Casio. It gives me nostalgic feeling when I wear it. Thank you Casio and Amazon.

Name: Priyanka Sahu
Review: Nice product very lightweight

Name: Koteswara Prasad
Review: Vow! ƒ∞ have fossil. Diesel and lot more collections. But this watch is unique!! Even its a small watch , still , it fits every wrist. Simple and apt time teller. Thanks to amazon!

Name: K P Ganesh
Review: Its a beatiful watch.Amazon was impressive with prompt delivery.I am happy with the product.Always wanted this wristwatch since my college days 35years back.

Name: AKASH R.
Review: Fantastic renovation of an old classic..!!!!

Name: Aninda Shankar Guha
Review: The product is showing made of CASIO, but the backing comes in 3rd part .Rest no need to describe..., all people's knows.

Name: Abhishek
Review: I wish it had water resistance of 30m or 10m atleast like its present in other models but its worth the money and I love the looks. Just for it if you are into vintage looks and small dials.Strictly not for big wrist.

Name: Abhishek Verma
Review: Best watch than others. Value price. Best thing is 10 year battery backup. Almost 2 year is past but it's battery is continuing...

Name: M. Satya
Review: Too small but, classy, features are good for a small case/dial.....

Name: Hari Menon
Review: The light is a little out of place.Make is good.But a good watch for the price and a nostalgic feeling from the retro age.

Name: Amazon customer
Review: Good product.easey function.light is very dim only.othewise it's good product.

Name: javeeddawalji
Review: Not original casio original made for malisha this is fast cope

Name: bindhya
Review: TOO GOOD  ROUGH AND TOUGH  FOR  SCHOOL GOING  KIDS.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Watch is very good but the weight of the watch is less then my expectation.Overall quality is perfect and band material also good.Old memories made fresh with the watch. :)

Name: HikeAngel
Review: Excellent watch with all the necessary functions IE Month, date, alarm, stopwatch and green light to see the time in dark. But those who like big dials or heavy watches may not like it .

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: I am not at happy with the watch.I was charged more than the actual price.I will never recommend this watch.

Name: Amit
Review: Looks excellent and of very good quality. The illuminated light is dim but overall an excellent watch

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Perfect product. Though the watch is not as huge as the new trends but it's adequate. Light and 100 genuine. Ppl with hairy arms might face issues.

Name: vivek bhadoria
Review: Got it delivered in less than 24hrs from Cloudtail. Didn't bought it for design like most, but for the sake of vintage memories. And yeah, the dail size is small so is the strap. But I just love it.
